text: @realDonaldTrump We will come back stronger and once we do I expect US and India govt to resolve not to have any trade with China. I was neutral for them but the whole world is suffering because of these Monsters. We cannot depend on China for anything #ChinaLiedPeopleDied @narendramodi #COVID19
